title: NodePort Service Practice
description: Learn how to expose a backend application using NodePort and access it from within and outside the Kubernetes cluster.

steps.title: Step 1 — Deploy Backend
steps.text: Apply backend-deploy.yaml to create two nginx pods.

steps.title: Step 2 — Expose via NodePort
steps.text: Apply backend-svc.yaml to expose backend on port 30080.

steps.title: Step 3 — Create Frontend Curl Pod
steps.text: Apply frontend-deploy.yaml to create a curl client pod.

steps.title: Step 4 — Verify Access
steps.text: Use curl inside frontend pod and from control plane node.
